about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable journey to the Titanic's bow.

 

Step into the deep with Magellan Limited's 2024 release: an immersive free-flying exploration of the Titanic's legendary bow. Experience breathtaking visuals designed to perfectly emulate the haunting beauty of its final resting place.

 

Take command of two state-of-the-art Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROVs), Romeo and Juliet, to complete scanning missions that highlight key features of the iconic wreck. Once the guided gameplay is complete, the adventure doesn’t end—explore the wreck freely, with no time limit, and marvel at every detail captured in the ultra-high-resolution dataset. 

 

This experience offers a true-to-life depiction of the underwater environment, complete with particle effects and immersive "fog" to replicate the conditions in which the Titanic now lies. Navigate with precision using the ROV interface, developed in collaboration with expert ROV pilots to ensure realistic controls and tools for a seamless exploration. 

Dive into the depths and discover the Titanic's bow like never before—your adventure awaits!

See below for our roadmap of development for this exciting project!:

short_description: Experience the bow of the Titanic wreck as captured by Magellan at the bottom of the North Atlantic Ocean. Immerse yourself as an ROV pilot to explore the wreck and complete missions to scan key features of this sleeping spectacle.
